title: e-Learning Platform Perception Measurement and Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Experience and Understanding of Professional Work Environments
context.additional_context: Analyzing the effectiveness and measuring perceptions of e-learning platforms for language learning purposes in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core elements of the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM): perceived usefulness, ease of use, technology attitude, content effectiveness, and instructional design.
Learners can analyze peer responses using a six-item scale measuring perceptions of e-learning platforms.
Learners can propose e-learning platform utilization strategies applicable to professional tasks through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
